title: X Factor: Celebrity's Kevin McHale loses voice hours before live shows
text:
There are fears about whether he’ll be able to perform (Pictures: ITV, Instagram)

X Factor: Celebrity has faced its first crisis as Kevin McHale has lost his voice just hours before the live shows, with viewers questioning whether he’ll be fit to perform.

Basically, it’s a performer’s worst nightmare.

The Glee star, who has been smashing it so far in the competition, shared a clip of himself looking a little under the weather on Instagram, as he wrote: ‘1 night to go, steam.’

Meanwhile, despite fears that the star might not be well enough to perform, a source said that Kevin is ‘powering through’.

Kevin’s resting up (Picture: Instagram)

A source told Metro.co.uk: ‘Kevin remains the true professional that he is and continues to power through despite feeling under the weather. He’s been resting his voice, but is all set for the weekend ahead. Everyone is really looking forward to hearing his performance.

‘And it’s not only the Try Star boys that are set to get everyone hot under the collar on Saturday night. Kevin will take to the stage with a whole dance squad dressed in thigh high red PVC boots – bringing Kinky Boots to the X Factor Celebrity stage.

‘He is set to impress viewers with a performance of Good As Hell by Lizzo. Dress run today was an indication of things to come and Kevin cannot wait to perform for a star studded crowd on Saturday night. He’s hoping the British public will get behind him.’
description: X Factor: Celebrity star Kevin McHale (Glee) loses voice hours before live shows with Megan McKenna and Vinnie Jones.
